snippet: The United States is seeking a security agreement authorizing a presence after Afghan forces assume responsibility for the war.
abstract: United States and Afghanistan begin talks on security agreement to authorize American troop presence in Afghanistan after 2014, when Afghan forces are to assume responsibility for war; goal is to complete talks by May 2013, well ahead of deadline for handing responsibility to Afghans.
lead_paragraph: The United States is seeking a security agreement authorizing a presence after Afghan forces assume responsibility for the war.

headline.seo: U.S. in Talks With Afghans on Presence After 2014
headline.main: U.S. in Talks With Afghans on Presence After 2014
headline.print_headline: U.S. in Talks With Afghans On Presence After 2014
